ing: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, drained
des: "This is a great, easy burger recipe. The ground beef is combined with green chile peppers and beef bouillon. This makes them very moist and flavorful. Serve on hamburger buns with your favorite fixings."
ins:
Preheat grill for high heat.
In a medium bowl, mix the beef, diced green chilies, and bouillon. Shape into 4 patties.
Lightly oil the grill grate. Grill patties 5 minutes per side, or until well done. Top each patty with cheese about 2 minutes prior to removing from grill.
